title: Biaxial Rotation
description: Biaxial Rotation is a universal system for rotating objects created 100% in Blueprints.
longDescription:
Biaxial Rotation is a universal system for rotating objects created 100% in Blueprints and it has the following functionality:

  • Rotation of objects in two axes.
  • Preservation of rotational inertia without the use of physics, inertia is calculated by a mathematical function that reduces the load on your device, which has a good effect on performance on mobile devices.
  • Support for both actors and static meshes, just add them to the array.
  • Switch between objects manually using the widget or automatically for a specified period of time. The change of objects is accompanied by animation, which you can turn off, as you have the opportunity to apply the particle effect at the time of changing the object, which will make the change of objects more beautiful and concise.
  • Zoom objects with a tweak in the set values ​​of the scale.
  • Automatic rotation of your objects with a designated speed.

Biaxial Rotation is perfect for: Loading screens, inventory, Classic and AR presentations, pick up items, and more.

You can get acquainted with the functionality of Biaxial Rotation by clicking on the link: https://youtu.be/bt1pON9px0g
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprint: 1

Input: Mouse, touch

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Android, IOS, Windows, MacOS, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Android, IOS, Windows, MacOS, Linux

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xX_jrFofQz-hc_PQEYFkmE8xNjSr55qE/view?usp=sharing
